page.title: 02MATERNITY HOSPITAL, HULL
page.content: Hedon Road Maternity Hospital serves the large population in this area. It is very busy.There are some smaller hospitals, public and private to assist it. Hedon Road is the best equipped of the hospitals and emergencies from the others are brought here. The buildings were first used as a "Fever Hospital" but as the general health of the country has improved, due to better food and medicine, and centralised maternity hospitals could now offer a safer place for having babies than the home its designation was changed. Recently their has been a (small) trend to stay at home and have the baby naturally instead of in the depersonalised, sterilised theatres of the hospital.
